name: Sniper (itch) (AGI)
description: You are a Special Ops sniper supporting advancing ground troops in retaking a city overtaken and destroyed by the enemy. The fighting is now going building-to-building to dislodge and destroy the enemy. They are heavily entrenched and there are many of them. Your mission is to neutralize as many as you can in 2 minutes, otherwise they will find and kill you. You are equipped with an M24 Sniper Weapons System, which consists of not only the rifle, but also a detachable telescopic sight and a separate large box of 7.62x51mm NATO cartridges. These cartridges are on an automatic chain feed to the rifle.
